DialogOption.texten: 911, what's your emergency?
Uhh hello? My neighbors house is on fire you need to send the entire fire department!
Where is your neighbors place?
How many people were inside when you spotted the fire?
On mount everest, it's pretty insane where I live. *Backround giggling*
I think like, 13.
EMPTY ID: back
Excuse me, do you have an emergency? You've reached 911.
Ok, where is your neighbors house at?
Yeah I know! Their place is on fire ontop of mount everest! Send the entire fire department now!
Dunno officer. Why don't you find out?
{Tell charges of prank calling} Sir you do know you can spend up to 3 month in a prison and recieve a 1000 fine right?
{Send Police} Ok sir, I'm sending the fire department now.
Sir you need to tell me where your neighbors live. They could all be in danger and worse, die.
What? I'm not lying and even if I was you can't just send me to jail and starve me until I get out stupid.
Well hurry the hell up!
I told you, find out yourself.
Do you not know where you live?
{Threaten} If you don't tell me you can face serious charges.
Do I not know where my own house is, of course I do! But like I said, you need to find out where it is. *Backround laughing*
Like wut? They up your ass officer! Goodbye!
Is this a prank call?

If anyone is killed or critically injured you can face serious fines and possibly inside of a prison for not giving your address to emergency services if someones life is in danger. So just tell me where this is at and it wont happen.
Alright dude, chill! It's on another planet fucking asshole.
Sir you do understand you can spend up to three months in a prison and a fine over 1000 dollars if this is a prank call.
